verses.name: 1 Kings 14:12
verses.text: Arise thou therefore, get thee to thine own house: and when thy feet enter into the city, the child shall die.

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:13
verses.text: And all Israel shall mourn for him, and bury him: for he only of Jeroboam shall come to the grave, because in him there is found some good thing toward the Lord God of Israel in the house of Jeroboam.

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:14
verses.text: Moreover the Lord shall raise him up a king over Israel, who shall cut off the house of Jeroboam that day: but what? even now.
